title: 1.4 Master Challenge 2
question: Write a pseudocode and JavaScript code, and ask the user to input the username. Create another string that will hold the domain name. Concatenate the user name with the domain name to form an email address. After concatenation, find and print the special symbols from the email address

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
